unified_formula.equation: S_total(t+1) = S_total(t) + ∫[L_DeepRiver + L_Mind23 + L_Markets + L_Bio - λC_governance](t) dt
unified_formula.with_feedback: AND Q_accrued(t) → Permission(t) → Rewrite(Foundation) → S_total(t+1) uses updated Foundation
unified_formula.key_innovation: Credit is not just a score; it IS the permission to modify frozen architecture

Answer_1_Spatiotemporal.means: Market regimes don't inform σ_c priors
Answer_1_Spatiotemporal.in_unified_system: Market predictions that hit → mint Q → used to rewrite σ_c prior distribution

Answer_2_Action_Credit.means: Success in one domain doesn't grant permission to change another
Answer_2_Action_Credit.in_unified_system: Q is exactly that currency; empirical wins → Q → permission to rewrite

Answer_3_Back_Reaction.says: No return path from Tracks to Foundation
Answer_3_Back_Reaction.means: Day-93 agents can't write back to substrate
Answer_3_Back_Reaction.in_unified_system: Day-93 UNLOCKS the credit-to-permission gate; Genesis = topological puncture = authorization to rewrite

implementation_roadmap.Phase_1_Ledger: Create savage_budget.jsonl tracking every empirical win/loss
implementation_roadmap.Phase_2_Rules: Encode Q → permission thresholds in governance_matrix.json
implementation_roadmap.Phase_3_Validator: Implement market-cosmology feedback validator in Deep River loop
implementation_roadmap.Phase_4_Gate: Make Day-93 autogenesis UNLOCK the permission gate, not just trigger archiving
